name: Ownly
description: OWNLY is a governance, token-based NFT platform that enable creators and collectors optimize the authentic value of NFT assets. Ownly is created to be a meeting place of artworks and collectors in the crypto space. OWN Token is the native utility token of Ownly, users are able to buy, own, collect, and trade 1 of 1 edition crypto artworks by talented artists. Own the only true copy and there's nothing else like that in the world -- as if it's made just for you.
